translated: “He will attain a mind of joy and faith, a mind of bliss, a mind of satisfaction, a mind of delight, a mind of clarity, a mind of light, a mind of stability, a mind of vastness, and an inexhaustible mind.🔽“He will attain a mind of joy and faith, a mind of bliss, a mind of satisfaction, a mind of delight, a mind of clarity, a mind of light, a mind of stability, a mind of vastness, and an inexhaustible mind.🔽“He will attain a mind of joy and faith, a mind of bliss, a mind of satisfaction, a mind of delight, a mind of clarity, a mind of light, a mind of stability, a mind of vastness, and an inexhaustible mind.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o //
translated: “He will attain a mind of joy and faith, a mind of bliss, a mind of satisfaction, a mind of delight, a mind of clarity, a mind of light, a mind of stability, a mind of vastness, and an inexhaustible mind.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o //
translated: It is the purification of all the maṇḍalas of the bodhisattvas’ dhāraṇīs.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa'o //
translated: It is the generation of the light of all the bodhisattvas’ samādhis.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bsgrub pa'o //
translated: It is the accomplishment of seeing all the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'o //
translated: It is the rain that falls from the clouds of all the buddhas’ Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi tshul thams cad brjod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi tshul thams cad brjod pa'o //
translated: It is the expression of all the ways of the bodhisattvas’ aspirations.

original: shes rab dang / ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang / ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par bskyed pa'o //
translated: It is the generation of the inconceivable light of wisdom and knowledge.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the generation of the sprouts of the bodhisattvas’ firm faculties.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gi g-yang sa thams cad nas skyob pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gi g-yang sa thams cad nas skyob pa'o //
translated: “The kalyāṇamitras are the ones who save me from all the abysses of the lower existences.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba @251b la gzhog pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba @251b la gzhog pa'o //
translated: The spiritual masters are the ones who lead me to the realization of the equality of all phenomena.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang / mi bde ba ston pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang / mi bde ba ston pa'o //
translated: The spiritual masters are the ones who show me the path of happiness and unhappiness.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongs su ston pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongs su ston pa'o //
translated: The spiritual masters are the ones who teach me the Great Vehicle.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams ngag gis 'doms pa'o //🔽dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdams ngag gis 'doms pa'o // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o //
translated: The spiritual masters are the ones who instruct me in the instructions of the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.🔽The spiritual masters are the ones who show me the path to the city of omniscience.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su phyin par skyel ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su phyin par skyel ba'o //
translated: The spiritual masters are the ones who accompany me until I reach the state of omniscience.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: The spiritual masters are the ones who cause me to enter the ocean of the way of the realm of phenomena.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o; ;dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o; ;dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: The spiritual masters are the ones who teach me the mandala of the assembly of the noble ones.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o //
translated: The spiritual masters are the ones who increase all my virtuous qualities.”

original: zhes de de ltar ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i tshe /
analyzed: zhes de de ltar ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i tshe /
translated: As he was thus weeping and lamenting,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad 'dzer to //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad 'dzer to //
translated: the hosts of gods who were present in the sky, who were always following him and encouraging him, and who were like the messengers of the Buddha, said to him:

original: rigs kyi bu /🔽dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams @252a *//
analyzed: rigs kyi bu / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams @252a *//
translated: “Noble son,🔽the spiritual masters are the ones who give the instructions

original: ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni /
analyzed: ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni /
translated: to the bodhisattvas.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: and the bhagavat buddhas are very pleased.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni /
translated: The bodhisattva who does not contradict the words of the kalyanamitra

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du'ang shin tu bsnyen pa yin /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du'ang shin tu bsnyen pa yin /
translated: is very close to omniscience.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tshom mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tshom mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin /
translated: The kalyanamitras are close to the bodhisattva who does not doubt the words of the kalyanamitra.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyi /🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyi / rigs kyi bu /
translated: All the aims of the bodhisattva who is never separated from the mental activity of the kalyanamitra are accomplished.

original: rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba gang na ba der song zhig dang / de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba gang na ba der song zhig dang / de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Noble son, go to the upasika Acalā in the royal capital of Supratiṣṭhita, and you will hear the bodhisattva conduct.”

original: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas /
analyzed: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas /
translated: Then Sudhana, the head merchant’s son, rose from the appearance of the wisdom of samādhi.

original: mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba gang na ba der song nas /
analyzed: mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba gang na ba der song nas /
translated: He gradually went to the city of Śrāvastī, to the house of the upāsikā Acalā.

original: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las /
translated: He searched for the upāsikā Acalā and asked about her.

original: de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa /
analyzed: de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa /
translated: Many people told him,

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

original: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba de ni; rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'phrogs shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba de ni; rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'phrogs shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste /
translated: the upāsikā Acalā is in her own house, young and beautiful,

original: rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
analyzed: rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
translated: surrounded by her relatives,

original: skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to //
analyzed: skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to //
translated: and she is teaching the Dharma to a great gathering of people.”

original: de nas @252b tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' ba chen po dang mos shing spro bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
analyzed: de nas @252b tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' ba chen po dang mos shing spro bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
translated: Then Sudhana, the head merchant’s son, with a mind filled with great joy, faith, and delight, went to the house of the upāsikā Acalā.

original: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe /
translated: When Sudhana was standing at the door of the house of the upasika Acalā,

original: des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa /
analyzed: des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa /
translated: the whole house was filled with a light that pervaded it and made the body and mind very happy,

original: gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal bar gyur nas /
analyzed: gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing gsal bar gyur nas /
translated: and it was the color of gold.

original: 'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la phog par gyur ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /
analyzed: 'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la phog par gyur ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang /
translated: As soon as that light touched Sudhana, the merchant’s son, he entered and was born in many doors of samadhi, such as the many doors of samadhi that control all feelings, the many doors of samadhi of the abode of peace, the many doors of samadhi that are free from all going,

original: kun du lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te yongs su skyes so //
analyzed: kun du lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te yongs su skyes so //
translated: the many doors of samadhi that are endowed with the equanimity of looking everywhere, and the many doors of samadhi of the Tathagata’s treasury, and so on. He entered and was born in about five hundred doors of samadhi.

original: de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste /
translated: They were extremely subtle and tender.

original: 'di ltar dper na /
analyzed: 'di ltar dper na /
translated: It was like this:

original: thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu ste /
translated: For example, it was like the consciousness that first enters the womb.

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par gyur to //
translated: Those samādhis were born as extremely subtle and tender.

original: des dri zhim po zhig tshor na yang /
analyzed: des dri zhim po zhig tshor na yang /
translated: He smelled a sweet scent,

original: de ni lha la yang med /
analyzed: de ni lha la yang med /
translated: which was not of the gods,

original: lha'i bu mo la yang med /
analyzed: lha'i bu mo la yang med /
translated: not of the daughters of the gods,

original: klu la yang med /🔽klu'i bu mo la yang med /
analyzed: klu la yang med / klu'i bu mo la yang med /
translated: not of the nāgas,🔽not of the daughters of the nāgas,

original: gnod sbyin la yang med /
analyzed: gnod sbyin la yang med /
translated: not of the yakṣas,

original: gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la yang med /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la yang med /
translated: not of the daughters of the yakṣas,

original: dri za la yang med /🔽dri za'i @253a *//
analyzed: dri za la yang med / dri za'i @253a *//
translated: not of the gandharvas,

original: bu mo la yang med /
analyzed: bu mo la yang med /
translated: not of the daughters of the gandharvas,

original: lha ma yin la yang med /
analyzed: lha ma yin la yang med /
translated: not of the asuras,

original: lha ma yin gyi bu mo la yang med /
analyzed: lha ma yin gyi bu mo la yang med /
translated: not of the daughters of the asuras,

original: nam mkha' lding la yang med /🔽nam mkha' lding gi bu mo la yang med; mi 'am ci la yang med /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding la yang med / nam mkha' lding gi bu mo la yang med; mi 'am ci la yang med /
translated: not of the garuḍas,🔽not of the daughters of the garuḍas,🔽not of the kinnaras,

original: mi 'am ci'i bu mo la yang med /🔽lto 'phye chen po la yang med /
analyzed: mi 'am ci'i bu mo la yang med / lto 'phye chen po la yang med /
translated: not of the daughters of the kinnaras,🔽not of the mahoragas,

original: lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la yang med /
analyzed: lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la yang med /
translated: and not of the daughters of the mahoragas.

original: mi la yang med /
analyzed: mi la yang med /
translated: It was not human,

original: mi'i bu mo la yang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to //
analyzed: mi'i bu mo la yang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to //
translated: and it was not the scent of a human woman.

original: bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /🔽kha dog dang mdog de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang / kha dog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang / mdog ma gtogs par de'i kha dog dang; mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
analyzed: bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong / kha dog dang mdog de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang / kha dog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang / mdog ma gtogs par de'i kha dog dang; mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
translated: There was no woman in the world of the ten directions who was equal to her in beauty, let alone superior.🔽There was no one in the world of the ten directions who was equal in complexion and color to her complexion and color, except for the complexion and color of the Tathāgata and the complexion and color of the bodhisattvas who have received consecration.

original: lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu zheng dang / dbyibs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs ma gtogs par de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang /
analyzed: lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu zheng dang / dbyibs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs ma gtogs par de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang /
translated: There was no one in the world of the ten directions who was equal in the size of her body, her height, and her shape to her size, height, and shape, except for the body of the Tathāgata and the bodies of the bodhisattvas who have received consecration.

original: dbyibs su mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
analyzed: dbyibs su mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
translated: Such a shape is not found in the worlds of the ten directions, let alone surpassing it.

original: 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba @253b thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma gtogs par de'i 'od kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
analyzed: 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba @253b thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma gtogs par de'i 'od kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
translated: Such an array of light is not found in the worlds of the ten directions, let alone surpassing it.

original: de'i kha'i drod kyi dri zhim po dang mnyam pa'i dri de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam /
analyzed: de'i kha'i drod kyi dri zhim po dang mnyam pa'i dri de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam /
translated: Such a sweet scent from the warmth of his mouth is not found in the abodes of the gods in the worlds of the ten directions,

original: klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
analyzed: klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong /
translated: nor in the abodes of nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, mahoragas, humans, or nonhumans, let alone surpassing it.

original: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur /
analyzed: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur /
translated: What kind of karma will lead to the attainment of the perfect wisdom?

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: What kind of karma will lead to the attainment of the perfect inconceivable miracles of samādhi?

original: gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /🔽spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /🔽spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu /
translated: What kind of karma will lead to the attainment of the perfect dhāraṇī?🔽What kind of karma will lead to the attainment of the perfect eloquence?

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa des /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang pa des /
translated: Then the bhagavat tathagata Suprataritanakharatha

original: kho mo'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: kho mo'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: understood my thoughts and said to me,

original: bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
translated: “Girl, generate an invincible mind in order to conquer all afflictions.

original: mngon par zhen pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir pham pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir pham pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
translated: Generate an invincible mind in order to eliminate all clinging.

original: chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
translated: Generate an invincible mind in order to comprehend the system of the profound dharma.

original: sems can bsam pa mi bzad pa dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i klong du ltung bas mi sgul ba'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: sems can bsam pa mi bzad pa dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i klong du ltung bas mi sgul ba'i sems skyed cig /
translated: Generate an invincible mind in order to not be moved by the ocean of sentient beings with unbearable intentions.

original: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
translated: Generate an invincible mind in order to not be confused about the place of birth in all the realms of existence.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir ngoms mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir ngoms mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig /
translated: Generate an insatiable mind in order to not interrupt the aspiration to see all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig /
translated: Generate the thought of dissatisfaction in order to uphold the Dharma clouds of all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir @257a *//🔽nges par rtogs pa'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir @257a *// nges par rtogs pa'i sems skyed cig /
translated: Generate the thought of realization in order to realize the appearance of the way of the Dharma of all buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzung ba'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzung ba'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed cig /
translated: Generate the thought of correct retention in order to uphold the wheel of Dharma of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta la ci smos kyi chung ngu na brdar byas pa tsam la yang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta la ci smos kyi chung ngu na brdar byas pa tsam la yang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems skyed cig /
translated: Generate the thought of non-error even in regard to the mere gestures of the tathāgatas, let alone what comes from the mouth of the tathāgatas.

original: bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces byung ste /
analyzed: bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces byung ste /
translated: “ Daughter, generate the thought of analysis in order to analyze the precious Dharma in accordance with the thoughts of sentient beings.”

original: de ltar rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: de ltar rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

original: kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang pa las /
analyzed: kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang pa las /
translated: She heard from the bhagavat, the tathagata, the arhat, the perfectly enlightened buddha Suparishkarakara,

original: chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag thos nas /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag thos nas /
translated: the Dharma way’s gateway of instructions such as these.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur /
translated: She became devoted to omniscient wisdom.

original: stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon par smon par gyur /
analyzed: stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni mngon par smon par gyur /
translated: She aspired to the nature of the ten powers.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad par gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad par gyur /
translated: She became faithful to the Buddha’s speech.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongs su sbyang bar dga'/
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongs su sbyang bar dga'/
translated: She delighted in purifying the Buddha’s ornamental light.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par dga'/
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par dga'/
translated: She delighted in accomplishing the Buddha’s perfect body.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur /
translated: She became devoted to the Buddha’s pure major and minor marks.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur /
translated: She aspired to the Buddha’s perfect retinue mandala.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam @257b par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam @257b par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur /
translated: He had faith in the pure buddha realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur /
translated: He was devoted to the perfect conduct of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas /
translated: He rejoiced in the perfect lifespan of the buddhas.

original: rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa bskyed de /
analyzed: rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa bskyed de /
translated: He developed a mind that was as difficult to defeat as a vajra, that was unbreakable and indestructible by all the afflictions, all the śrāvakas, and all the pratyekabuddhas.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus /🔽bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa la spyad par mi dran na /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus / bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa la spyad par mi dran na /
translated: from that moment on, through the power of that development of the mind,

original: gnyis kyis gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos /
analyzed: gnyis kyis gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos /
translated: for as many eons as there are atoms in Jambudvīpa, he did not even think of desire, let alone engage in the union of the two organs.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la'ang khong khro bo'i sems gcig ma bskyed na /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la'ang khong khro bo'i sems gcig ma bskyed na /
translated: Since then, not even a single thought of anger has arisen in me toward my own relatives.

original: de ma yin pa'i sems can ma nyes pa gzhan lta la ci smos /
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i sems can ma nyes pa gzhan lta la ci smos /
translated: How could I possibly be angry toward other innocent sentient beings?

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bdag tu lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bdag tu lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang bskyed par mi dran na /
translated: Since then, not even a single thought has arisen in me that is associated with the view of self.

original: de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te mngon par chags pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te mngon par chags pa lta ci smos /
translated: How could I possibly be attached to other possessions that I have made my own?

original: shi 'pho dang / mngal na gnas pa'i tshe 'ang sems rmongs pa'am /
analyzed: shi 'pho dang / mngal na gnas pa'i tshe 'ang sems rmongs pa'am /
translated: Even when I was dying and when I was in the womb, I do not recall any confused thoughts arising.

original: 'du shes sna tshogs sam /
analyzed: 'du shes sna tshogs sam /
translated: I do not recall any thoughts of various perceptions arising.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyang byung du mi dran na /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyang byung du mi dran na /
translated: I do not recall any neutral thoughts arising.

original: legs par bsam shing gnas pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: legs par bsam shing gnas pa lta ci smos /
translated: How could I possibly have any thoughts of proper reflection and abiding?

original: bskal pa de snyed cig tu @258a *//
analyzed: bskal pa de snyed cig tu @258a *//
translated: For that many eons,

original: sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung ngu na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang rjes su mi dran na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung ngu na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang rjes su mi dran na /
translated: I do not recall even seeing a single buddha, even in a dream.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos /
translated: How could it be possible to see with the ten eyes of a bodhisattva?

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang chung ngu na ming du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge gcig kyang brjod par mi dran na /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang chung ngu na ming du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge gcig kyang brjod par mi dran na /
translated: “Since I have been under his care, I have been able to hold the Dharma clouds of all the tathāgatas, but I do not remember even one word of Dharma, not even a name, not even a single syllable.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos /🔽de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du chos kyi rgya mtsho de snyed cig 'thung 'thung yang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la tshig 'ga' yang ma bsam ma brtags par mi dran no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos / de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du chos kyi rgya mtsho de snyed cig 'thung 'thung yang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la tshig 'ga' yang ma bsam ma brtags par mi dran no //
translated: How could I possibly remember what has come from the treasure of the mouth of the tathāgatas?🔽“Since I have been under his care, I have drunk from the ocean of the Dharma, but I do not remember even one worldly Dharma, not even a single word.

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de snyed cig gis chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang tshul yang rung ste /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de snyed cig gis chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang chung ngu na 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang tshul yang rung ste /
translated: “Since I have been under his care, I have been able to enter the ocean of the ways of the Dharma, but I do not remember even one worldly skill or way.

original: chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la yang kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu med do //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la yang kho mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu med do //
translated: There is no Dharma gateway that I have not accomplished through samādhi.

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung yang /🔽ji ltar yongs su bzung ba las /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung yang / ji ltar yongs su bzung ba las /
translated: “Since then, I have received the Dharma wheels of that many tathāgatas.🔽I do not recall having forgotten even a single word or syllable,

original: sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par chung ngu na rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang / yi ge 'ga' yang por bar mi dran no //
analyzed: sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par chung ngu na rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang / yi ge 'ga' yang por bar mi dran no //
translated: except for the purpose of training beings.

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho @258b de snyed cig mthong yang /🔽chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho @258b de snyed cig mthong yang / chung ngu na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste /
translated: “Since then, I have seen that many oceans of buddhas.🔽I do not recall having failed to accomplish even a single prayer,

original: smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do //
analyzed: smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do //
translated: even a prayer for the lineage of emanated buddhas, in order to purify the ocean of all beings.

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /🔽sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang /
translated: Since that time,

original: kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no //
analyzed: kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no //
translated: I do not recall ever not accomplishing some aspect of the bodhisattva conduct of those oceans of buddhas, those oceans of bodhisattva conduct, for the sake of purifying my own bodhisattva conduct.

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
translated: Since that time,

original: sems can gang kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma bskul pa de lta bu gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran no //
analyzed: sems can gang kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma bskul pa de lta bu gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran no //
translated: I do not recall any sentient being coming into my presence whom I did not inspire toward the highest, complete enlightenment.

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
translated: Since that time,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs su mi dran no //🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs su mi dran no // rigs kyi bu /
translated: I do not recall ever accomplishing a single thought associated with the attitude of the śrāvakas or the pratyekabuddhas.

original: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
analyzed: de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du /
translated: “Noble one, since that time,

original: bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig lon yang /
analyzed: bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig lon yang /
translated: “For eons as numerous as the atoms in Jambudvīpa,

original: tshig dang yi ge 'ga' la yang the tshom bskyed pa'am /
analyzed: tshig dang yi ge 'ga' la yang the tshom bskyed pa'am /
translated: I did not give rise to doubt about even a single word or syllable.

original: gnyis kyi 'du shes sam /
analyzed: gnyis kyi 'du shes sam /
translated: I did not give rise to the perception of duality,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam /
translated: the perception of conceptualization,

original: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam; rab kyi 'du shes sam /🔽bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam; rab kyi 'du shes sam / bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam /
translated: the perception of variety,🔽the perception of good and bad,

original: sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dran no //
analyzed: sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dran no //
translated: or the perception of beauty and ugliness.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble one,

original: kho mo ni de phyin chad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral @259a *//
analyzed: kho mo ni de phyin chad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral @259a *//
translated: ever since then I have never been separated from the appearance of buddhas,

original: lo; ;sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: lo; ;sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bral lo //
translated: I have never been separated from the bhagavat buddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral lo //
translated: I have never been separated from the bodhisattvas,

original: yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang ma bral lo //
translated: I have never been separated from the true kalyāṇamitras,

original: sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma bral lo //
translated: I have never been separated from hearing the prayers of the buddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo //
translated: I have never been separated from hearing the conduct of the bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo //
translated: He was never separated from hearing the way of the bodhisattva perfections.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo //
translated: He was never separated from hearing the way of the light of the bodhisattva bhūmis.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin mi bzad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo //🔽mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin mi bzad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo // mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing /
translated: He was never separated from hearing the attainment of the bodhisattva’s inexhaustible treasury of dhāraṇīs and samādhis.

original: khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo //
translated: He was never separated from hearing the way of entering and comprehending the web of world realms without end or middle.

original: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo //
translated: He was never separated from hearing the cause of the arising of the realm of beings without end or middle.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo //
translated: He was never separated from the light of the wisdom that completely exhausts the web of the kleśas of all beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa dang ma bral lo //
translated: I am never separated from the attainment of the wisdom that is the cause of the arising of the roots of merit of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo //
translated: I am never separated from the manifestation of my body according to the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa @259b dang ma bral lo //🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa @259b dang ma bral lo // rigs kyi bu /
translated: I am never separated from the pure circle of the voice that causes all sentient beings to understand.

original: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: “Noble one, I have entered into this bodhisattva liberation called the essence of the invincible wisdom and this gateway of the samādhi called the display of being indefatigable in seeking all Dharmas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di dang / slobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di dang / slobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang /
translated: the gateway to the bodhisattva conduct called the firm commitment, the gateway of dhāraṇī called the sameness of all phenomena, and the gateway of the light of the wisdom of training called the illumination of all the bases of the Dharma.

original: cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na /
analyzed: cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na /
translated: If you have inconceivable miracles,

original: rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam /
translated: son of noble family, do you wish to see them directly?”

original: smras pa / 'phags ma /
analyzed: smras pa / 'phags ma /
translated: He replied, “Āryā,🔽I do.”

original: 'tshal lo // de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du /
analyzed: 'tshal lo // de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du /
translated: Then, the upāsikā Acalā, while remaining there,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang /🔽ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang /
translated: the bodhisattva liberation door called the essence of the knowledge that is difficult to conquer, and so on; the bodhisattva liberation door called the ornament of being indefatigable in seeking all the doors of samādhi, and so on; the bodhisattva liberation door called the ornament of the maṇḍala of the inexhaustible meaning, and so on;

original: rnam par spyad pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dang / nges par rtogs par byas so //🔽de ltar dge @260a *//
analyzed: rnam par spyad pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dang / nges par rtogs par byas so // de ltar dge @260a *//
translated: the bodhisattva liberation door called the maṇḍala of the knowledge of the ten strengths, and so on; the bodhisattva liberation door called the inexhaustible treasure of the buddha family, and so on; and he looked at, engaged in, and realized ten thousand bodhisattva liberation doors.

original: bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
analyzed: bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
translated: In that way, the upāsikā Acalā, as soon as she had entered into samādhi,

original: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
analyzed: tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
translated: the merchant’s son Sudhana

original: phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa dang / bee d'urya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo //
analyzed: phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa dang / bee d'urya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo //
translated: and that they were based on a ground made of pure beryl.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya na /
translated: In each world, in a hundred million four-continent worlds,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste /
translated: he saw a hundred million tathāgatas.

original: la la ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas /
analyzed: la la ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas /
translated: Some were in the Tuṣita heaven,

original: la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo //
analyzed: la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo //
translated: and some were passing into final nirvāṇa.

original: de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bee d'urya'i rang bzhin de dag yongs su dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bee d'urya'i rang bzhin de dag yongs su dag cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: This was because those worlds, made of beryl, were pure and free of obscurations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od zer dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab par mda' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od zer dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab par mda' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur to //
translated: and he saw the individual retinues of those thus-gone ones, which were like oceans.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad brjod pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad brjod pa /
translated: He heard the circles of speech of those thus-gone ones, which expressed all the wheels of the Dharma,

original: sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grag pa'ang thos par gyur to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grag pa'ang thos par gyur to //
translated: and which resounded in the ears of all beings.

original: de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas /🔽tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the upāsikā Acalā arose from that samādhi

original: @260b rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam /
analyzed: @260b rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam /
translated: and said to Sudhana, the head merchant’s son, “Noble one, did you see?

original: thos sam / shes sam /
analyzed: thos sam / shes sam /
translated: Did you hear?🔽Did you understand?”

original: smras pa / 'phags ma /🔽mthong ngo // thos so //
analyzed: smras pa / 'phags ma / mthong ngo // thos so //
translated: He replied, “Āryā,🔽I saw, I heard,

original: rig go / rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rig go / rigs kyi bu /
translated: and I understood.”

original: kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi dam brtan pa la slob cing /
analyzed: kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi dam brtan pa la slob cing /
translated: She was training in the bodhisattva conduct that is steadfast and firm.

original: chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste /
translated: She was resting in equipoise in the meditative absorption of the display of never tiring of seeking all Dharmas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas /
translated: She was abiding in the essence of the knowledge that is difficult to conquer, which is the gateway to the bodhisattva liberation.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas /🔽sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas / sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na /
translated: She had realized the dhāraṇī of the level of the sameness of all Dharmas, and with the eloquence of the wisdom light that illuminates all the bases of Dharma, she was teaching the Dharma to satisfy all beings.🔽“Noble one, I know only this bodhisattva liberation called the essence of the knowledge that is difficult to conquer.

original: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa /
analyzed: kho mos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa /
translated: How could I know the conduct or describe the qualities of bodhisattvas who have attained the inconceivable, immeasurable qualities of bodhisattvas, who are like the king of birds soaring in the sky without touching the ground?

original: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gdon pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po ltar yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gdon pa'i phyir /
translated: Like a great king of garuḍas, he is able to carry the bodhisattvas who are fully matured.🔽

original: sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa /🔽tshong pa ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa / tshong pa ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing /
translated: Like a great king of garuḍas, he enters the ocean of all beings in order to rescue the bodhisattvas who are ready to be saved.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyu ba /🔽mthu dang ldan pa'i nya pa ltar yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i lag pas sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon @261a *//
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyu ba / mthu dang ldan pa'i nya pa ltar yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i lag pas sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon @261a *//
translated: Like a merchant, he sails the ocean of the Dharma in order to obtain the precious jewel of the wisdom of the ten powers and to travel to the precious island of omniscience.

original: pa'i phyir chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba /
analyzed: pa'i phyir chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba /
translated: Like a powerful fisherman, he sails the ocean of the Dharma in order to catch with the net of the pleasant Dharma the beings who are born in the water of craving and to rescue them.

original: lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g-yul chen po gdul ba bzlog pa'i phyir khams gsum gyi gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba /
analyzed: lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g-yul chen po gdul ba bzlog pa'i phyir khams gsum gyi gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba /
translated: Like the king of the gods, he fills and sails through the three realms in order to defeat the great army of the demigod afflictions.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi sred pa'i chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin tu bskam pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa /🔽zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mu da rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon par shar ba; sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing rnam par spel
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi sred pa'i chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin tu bskam pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa / zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mu da rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon par shar ba; sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing rnam par spel
translated: Like the orb of the sun, he rises in the sky of the realm of phenomena in order to completely dry up the water of craving and the mud of the afflictions of sentient beings.🔽Like the full moon, he rises in the sky of wisdom in order to open the water lily of the minds of those to be tamed.

original: ba'i phyir / byams mi byams dang / mthon dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa /
analyzed: ba'i phyir / byams mi byams dang / mthon dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa /
translated: Like the surface of the earth, he remains in the world equally, without any distinction between those who are dear and those who are not, or between high and low, in order to produce and increase the sprouts of the faculties of virtue of all beings.

original: rlung dmar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i shing dang / shing phran gyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba /
analyzed: rlung dmar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i shing dang / shing phran gyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir chags pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba /
translated: Like a hurricane, he moves in all directions without attachment in order to uproot the trees and thickets of the afflictions and views of all sentient beings.

original: 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir /🔽'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir / 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am /
translated: They are like universal monarchs, using the wealth of the means of attraction to attract all beings.

original: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
analyzed: yon tan brjod par nus re skan /
translated: How could I know the conduct or describe the qualities of those who act in the world?

original: song / rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: song / rigs kyi bu /
translated: Go, son of noble family!

original: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na /
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na /
translated: In this southern region, in the land of Aṅga,

original: grong @261b khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: grong @261b khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: there is a town called Rājagṛha.

original: de na kun du rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
analyzed: de na kun du rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi /
translated: There lives a mendicant called Sarvārthajña.

original: de'i gan du song la /
analyzed: de'i gan du song la /
translated: Go to him

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig /🔽de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig / de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis /
translated: and ask him how bodhisattvas should train in bodhisattva conduct and in what way they should practice it.”

original: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
translated: Then Sudhana, the head merchant’s son, bowed his head to the feet of the upāsikā Acalā,

original: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te /
translated: He circumambulated the upāsikā Acalā many hundreds of thousands of times, keeping her to his right, and, looking back at her again and again,

original: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i drung nas song ngo //
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i drung nas song ngo //
translated: he departed from the presence of the upāsikā Acalā.

original: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
analyzed: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang /
translated: Then Sudhana, the head merchant’s son,

original: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba mngon du byas te /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba mngon du byas te /
translated: having seen the upāsikā Acalā,

original: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing /
translated: remembered the upāsikā Acalā’s instructions,

original: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo bas bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par brjod pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par phye ba dang / smos pa dang /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma mi g-yo bas bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par brjod pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par phye ba dang / smos pa dang /
translated: and thought about the upāsikā Acalā’s teaching, perfect teaching, proclamation, explanation, description, perfect description, establishment, analysis, and indication,

original: rgya cher bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdon mi za bar yid ches shing /
analyzed: rgya cher bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdon mi za bar yid ches shing /
translated: and all the extensive teachings that she had given, which he had no doubt about.

original: rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / snang bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / snang bar bya ba dang /
translated: and equalize.🔽He was to go from place to place,

original: mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang / yul nas yul @262a *//🔽du brgyu ste /🔽rgyu zhing song song nas yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas /
analyzed: mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang / yul nas yul @262a *// du brgyu ste / rgyu zhing song song nas yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas /
translated: traveling from country to country.🔽As he traveled, he arrived at the place called Anupamā.

original: grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te /
analyzed: grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te /
translated: He searched and looked for the city of Anupamā.

original: nyi ma nub tu cha ba zhig na /🔽grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas /
analyzed: nyi ma nub tu cha ba zhig na / grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas /
translated: As the sun was setting,🔽he arrived at the city of Anupamā.

original: grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song ste /
analyzed: grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang du song ste /
translated: He entered the city of Anupamā.

original: grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo'i dbus shig tu phyin nas /
analyzed: grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mdo'i dbus shig tu phyin nas /
translated: He went to the center of the crossroads in the city.

original: srang gi sgo nas srang gi sgo dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo nas /
analyzed: srang gi sgo nas srang gi sgo dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo nas /
translated: From one street intersection to another street intersection, from one crossroads to another crossroads,

analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te /

original: smras pa / rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: smras pa / rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: kho bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste /

analyzed: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o //

analyzed: sgo thams cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting 'dzin gyi sgo dang / dngos po med pa @263a *// la gnas pas /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

analyzed: de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi shi 'pho'i sgo thams cad dang / sems can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang /

analyzed: skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag gi sems can kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa /

analyzed: skye ba kun du 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa / sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa /

translated: those belonging to the garuḍa realms, those belonging to the kinnara realms, those belonging to the mahoraga realms, those belonging to the human realms, and those belonging to the animal realms.

original: nam mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang /🔽gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / @263b mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / @263b mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang /
translated: They are the path of the gods, the path of the nāgas, the path of the yakṣas, the path of the gandharvas, the path of the asuras, the path of the garuḍas, the path of the kinnaras, the path of the mahoragas, the path of the hell beings, the path of the animals,🔽the path of the world of Yama, the path of humans, the path of nonhumans, the path of those who are attached to various views, the path of those who are devoted to the Śrāvakayāna,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis byed de /

translated: For some beings, by manifesting the form of a śrāvaka, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a universal monarch, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a king of the gods, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a king of the nāgas, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a king of the gandharvas, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a king of the asuras, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a king of the garuḍas, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a king of the kinnaras, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.

translated: For some beings, by manifesting the form of a human king, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a brahmin, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a householder, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a monk, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of a nun, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.🔽For some beings, by manifesting the form of an upāsaka, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.

analyzed: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste / byang chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar brtan zhing yongs su bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do //
translated: For some beings, by manifesting the form of an upāsikā, he acts for their benefit by teaching the Dharma.

original: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
translated: For some beings, by manifesting the form of a god, he acts for their benefit

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do //
translated: He acts for the sake of the world by means of the bodhisattva conduct, because he generates the vow to purify all buddha-fields and to mature all sentient beings.🔽🔽

analyzed: sems can la la la @264a *// ni 'di lta ste / ngan du spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa dang mthun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas / skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do //
translated: He acts for the benefit of beings by proclaiming the bodhisattva conduct in all its aspects, in order to generate the aspiration to purify all buddha-fields and to bring all sentient beings to full maturity.🔽To some beings, he acts for their benefit by arousing in them a sense of urgency through revealing the suffering of the hells, which is the result of evil conduct.

original: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /
translated: To some beings, he acts for their benefit by revealing the suffering of the animal realm, which is the result of delusion.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas dga' ba chen po bskyed cing don byed do //🔽sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /🔽sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sku la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do //🔽sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /

translated: In the same way, he accomplishes the aims of sentient beings by producing great joy in them, saying: “All the good qualities that you have produced in the Tathagatas will certainly reach the ultimate goal of omniscience.”

original: mi zlog cing lhun gyis grub pa dang / rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi zlog cing lhun gyis grub pa dang / rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: To some sentient beings, he accomplishes the aims by causing them to aspire to omniscience, by causing them to aspire to the body of a Buddha, which is endowed with the power to carry out the deeds of a Buddha without interruption, spontaneously and inexhaustibly.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do //
translated: It is the function of the Buddha to proclaim the greatness of the Buddha.🔽

original: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste /🔽tshur zil gyis gnon la /
analyzed: sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste / tshur zil gyis gnon la /
translated: I benefit beings by describing the greatness of the buddhas.

original: phar zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do //🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: phar zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su brjod cing don byed do // rigs kyi bu /
translated: “I benefit beings by describing the greatness of the buddhas in order to inspire some beings to aspire to attain the perfect body of a buddha, which is able to overpower others but cannot be overpowered by others.

original: @264b gzhan yang kho mo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di yi bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang / srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams cad dang khyim thams cad dang / mthun par 'dus pa'i rdal thams cad dang /
analyzed: @264b gzhan yang kho mo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di yi bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang / srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams cad dang khyim thams cad dang / mthun par 'dus pa'i rdal thams cad dang /
translated: “Moreover, son of noble family, I am in all the crossroads, all the streets, all the intersections, all the neighborhoods, all the houses, all the markets, all the gathering places, and all the dwellings of the people of this city of Ratipradhāna.

original: grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba dang /
analyzed: grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba dang /
translated: In all the towns and all the villages, he taught the Dharma to the women, men, boys, and girls who had gathered in various groups, in accordance with their thoughts, their deeds, their powers,

original: rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon par bsgrubs shing chos ston kyang /
analyzed: rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dang mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon par bsgrubs shing chos ston kyang /
translated: and their way of life. He manifested a body with a height and width that was in harmony with theirs.

original: sems can de dag gis de sum bstan pa dang / de ga las 'ongs pa mi shes te /
analyzed: sems can de dag gis de sum bstan pa dang / de ga las 'ongs pa mi shes te /
translated: But those sentient beings did not know who he was or where he had come from.

original: gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni med pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni med pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: However, after hearing him, they did not fail to practice correctly.

original: gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: 'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o //

analyzed: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o //

translated: “Noble one, I live in this city of Bhadraṃkara on the ocean shore, striving in that way to benefit and bring happiness to beings.

analyzed: kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde bar brtson pas rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so //

analyzed: klu'i gnas thams cad dang / klu 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas @273a *//
translated: all the abodes of nāgas, all the conflicts of nāgas, all the abodes of yakṣas, all the conflicts of yakṣas, all the abodes of rākṣasas,

analyzed: thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / 'byung po'i bar chad rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes te /
translated: all the fears of rākṣasas, and all the obstacles of bhūtas.

original: klong yod pa thams cad dang / klong thams cad bkol ba dang / dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spangs pa dang / chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: klong yod pa thams cad dang / klong thams cad bkol ba dang / dba' rlabs chen po yongs su spangs pa dang / chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: I know all the whirlpools, all the eddies, the avoidance of great waves, and the different colors of the water.

original: nyi zla dang / gza' skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nyi zla dang / gza' skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig kyang rab tu shes so //

translated: Those beings who have seen me and those beings who have heard my Dharma teaching will be free from the danger of being wrecked in the ocean of saṃsāra.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro //

translated: They will manifest the wisdom that enters the ocean of omniscience.

original: srid pa rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: srid pa rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: They will enter the ocean of existence in order to dry it up.

original: dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They will attain the light of wisdom that is the ocean of the three times.”

original: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will aspire to end the ocean of suffering of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will strive to clear the turbidity of the ocean of the minds of all sentient beings.

original: zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be diligent in purifying the ocean of all realms.

original: phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par dgang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par dgang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be irreversible from filling the ocean of all directions.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will comprehend the different oceans of the faculties of all beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will follow the ocean of the conduct of all sentient beings.

original: 'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du'ang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du'ang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will manifest the reflections of the ocean of the thoughts of beings.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble one,

analyzed: kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam @274a *//

analyzed: lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba /

original: chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba /
analyzed: chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba /

analyzed: 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa /

analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa /

analyzed: sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsrub pa /
translated: who are engaged in churning the ocean of the attachments of all beings,🔽and who are engaged in the ocean of the means of gathering all beings?

analyzed: dus rgya mtsho thams cad dang tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa /

analyzed: 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs shes pa /

analyzed: mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas /

original: gdong mchi mas bkang ste ngu zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas ma ngoms bzhin du mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ngo ////🔽bam po dgu bcu bdun pa /
